content.description:
Directions: Each of the questions or incomplete statements below is followed by four suggested answers or completions. Select the one that is best in each case.

The next questions refer to the 1932 German political poster below.

TRANSLATION:

“Women! Millions of men without work; millions of children without a future.

Save the German family—vote Adolf Hitler!”
content.question: After the Second World War, European states undertook which of the following to address the circumstances depicted in the poster?

choices.label: The expansion of social welfare programs
The mandatory proportional representation of women in parliaments

content.answer: The expansion of social welfare programs

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
